algorithm_technique: Using a set for efficient lookup of jewels and iterating through stones
problem_summary_simple: Count how many of your stones are also considered jewels.
problem_summary_technical: Count stones present in a set of jewels using hash set lookups.
key_insights: Using a set for the `jewels` string allows for O(1) average time complexity lookups.
Iterating through the `stones` string and checking membership in the jewel set is efficient.
The constraints are small, so even less optimized solutions might pass, but a set is optimal.
